name: Rainbow Brite and the Star Stealer (1985)
description: \n                        This routine small tots' animated feature is about a young girl named Rainbow Brite who brings color to the universe. She is forced to do battle with the henchmen of a wicked princess determined to plunge everything into a colorless darkness. Before the princess can carry out her plan, Rainbow joins up with the warrior Krys and some special horses to outsmart and outfight the anti-technicolor faction.\n
imageName: Rainbow Brite and the Star Stealer (1985)
